entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 3.3Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
